column5: Offering a nice bedroom/bathroom in a 5 bedroom home. Included spaces are downstairs lounge area,full kitchen, dining area&laundry as well as WiFi & Direct TV Cable.I am selective... and prefer a single stable employed proffessional with no kids, no smoking,no drugs, and no pets. It is a quiet comfortable home with minimal traffic. Long stay residency is available to leased occupant only. It is indeed a very comfortable/stylish environment in a quiet neighborhood. Approx 22 mins to downtown.
